document_title: Fournier syndrome: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Fournier syndrome is an emergency, potentially life-threatening due to extremely dangerous complications. However, this condition can be proactively prevented early on. Some useful methods to refer to include:
Maintaining good hygiene: Always keeping the genitals and perineum hygienic, clean, and dry is the basic solution to reduce the risk of Fournier's disease.; Protect the genitals from dangerous injuries, scratches...; Take good care of wounds on the genitals and surrounding areas (if any) to avoid bacterial penetration.; Maintain a reasonable weight; Stop smoking.; Contact your doctor immediately if you discover signs of redness or swelling in the genitals or surrounding areas.
